episodes.title: The Target
episodes.description: Detective Jimmy McNulty's investigation into a drug organization draws the attention of a skeptical judge.

episodes.title: The Detail
episodes.description: McNulty gets assigned to a new unit while Stringer Bell disciplines a dealer for stealing.

episodes.title: The Buys
episodes.description: The detail begins surveillance on the Barksdale operation while D'Angelo trains new recruits.

episodes.title: Old Cases
episodes.description: The detail discovers a connection between a recent homicide and an old case file.

episodes.title: The Pager
episodes.description: The detail implements a wiretap on the Barksdale crew's pagers as tensions rise in the towers.

episodes.title: The Wire
episodes.description: The team finally gets approval for a wiretap but faces technical challenges in implementation.

episodes.title: One Arrest
episodes.description: A key arrest threatens to unravel the investigation as political pressures mount.

episodes.title: Lessons
episodes.description: McNulty clashes with superiors while the detail learns the complexities of the drug trade.

episodes.title: Game Day
episodes.description: A major police operation coincides with a crucial Barksdale drug shipment.

episodes.title: The Cost
episodes.description: The investigation's moral compromises come to light as violence escalates in the streets.

episodes.title: The Hunt
episodes.description: A shocking act of violence forces the detail to accelerate their investigation timeline.

episodes.title: Cleaning Up
episodes.description: The detail races to gather evidence before the Barksdale organization can cover its tracks.

episodes.title: Sentencing
episodes.description: The season culminates in dramatic courtroom confrontations and unexpected consequences.
